title: Aw mi sang tam tak zaite chu
lyrics:
Aw mi sang tam tak zaite chu,
Tlantu ropui fakin;
Kan Pathian ropui ber Tlantu
Hmangaihna chu fakin.

Aw, kan Lalber, min hruaitu chuan,
Chakna min pe ang che;
Hemi khawvel zawng chungah hian,
I thu puang darh turin.

Lal Isua hming min muantu hi,
Kan lungngaih tikiangtu;
Mi sual tan pawh ri mawi a ni,
Min thlamuantu ber hi.

Sualna zawng zawng hnehtu chuanin,
Mi tangte a chhan chhuak;
A thisen hlu tak a pe,
Keini min chhandam nan.
